title: New blog under construction
description: We're re-launching slinberg.net using Distill. Stand by!
contents:
This is a re-launch of slinberg.net, using the distill platform to align with the UMASS DACSS program I am presently enrolled in.
Pardon the dust while we redecorate. First up will be a soup-to-nuts, zero-to-hero walkthrough of how this site was built and deployed on a custom domain with GitHub.
